channel.title: +1 on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +1 on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: 8 The Rajasuya
item.description: 12 b c Friend of speech, born of heat, thou art undefeated; thou art the share of Soma. d The pure I purify you with the pure, the bright with the bright, the immortal with ambrosia, hail! caring for the royal consecration. e Clothed in these (waters), sharing joy, glorious in strength, Undefeated and busy, In the waters hath Varuna made his abode, The child [1] of the waters in those most motherly.
